      public VocabularyDatabase() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Connect to a storage database and store the connection.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • VocabularyDatabase

      public VocabularyDatabase​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Connect to a database and store the connection.
      Parameters:
      url - A JDBC URL.
      username - A user name for the database connection.
      password - The corresponding password to the user name.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
      So startet man die Datenbank:. The HSQLDB server can be started with the following commands: cd java -cp lib/hsqldb.jar org.hsqldb.server.Server --database.0 file:db_vokabel --dbname.0 vokabeltrainer
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • insert

      public void insert​(java.lang.String en, java.lang.String de) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Insert an English vocabulary and it's German translation. Note: Having multiple translations for a single vocabulary is not possible.
      Parameters:
      en - An English vocabulary.
      de - The German translation of the English vocabulary.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • wipe

      public void wipe() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Wipe all vocabulary entries from the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • list

      public java.sql.ResultSet list() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Select vocabulary entries from the database.
      Returns:
      A result set containing every vocabulary entry in the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • print

      public void print​(java.sql.ResultSet rs) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Print the content of a ResultSet from a select statement to the vocabularies.
      Parameters:
      rs - A ResultSet of a previously executed SQL query.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
